data.eml:eml: A comprehensive and integrative re-description of Synchaeta tremula (Müller, 1786) and the newly rediscovered Synchaeta tremuloida Pourriot, 1965 (Rotifera: Synchaetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilke, Tanja, Ahlrichs, Wilko H., Bininda-Emonds, Olaf R. P. (2017): A comprehensive and integrative re-description of Synchaeta tremula (Müller, 1786) and the newly rediscovered Synchaeta tremuloida Pourriot, 1965 (Rotifera: Synchaetidae). Zootaxa 4276 (4): 503-518, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4276.4.3
